sections.text: Physical standards3-3412.Physical standardsWeights and measures that are traceable to the United States prototype standards supplied by the federal government, or approved as being satisfactory by the national institute of standards and technology, shall be the state reference standards of weights and measures and shall be maintained in such calibration as prescribed by the national institute of standards and technology. All secondary standards may be prescribed by the associate director and shall be verified on initial receipt and as often thereafter as deemed necessary by the associate director.
